articles.description: Tata Motors is celebrating a new production milestone as the 1,00,000th unit of the Harrier rolled off the assembly line. The Harrier was launched in 2019. Today prices for the Harrier start from Rs 14.99 lakh (ex-showroom).

articles.title: Siemens to sell low voltage motors, gears biz for Rs 2,200 crore - Moneycontrol
articles.description: The transaction is subject to fulfilment of conditions precedents agreed upon between the parties, including receipt of requisite shareholders, statutory and regulatory approvals, as applicable, the company said.
articles.content:
Technology firm Siemens' board on Friday approved the sale of low voltage motors and geared motors businesses to a Siemens AG subsidiary -- Siemens Large Drives India -- for Rs 2,200 crore.
